titleStmt.title: A prospective of the naval triumph of the Venetians over the Turk to Signor Pietro Liberi, that renowned and famous painter / by Gio. Francesco Busenello.

titleStmt.author: Busenello, Giovanni Francesco, 1598-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
